ItineraryBreakdown.carbonTooltip: Estimated carbon footprint, knowing that the average carbon footprint per passenger per kilometer is 3.8gCO2e per kilometer (source: RATP)

LineInformation.nbStops: Total number of stops on the line
LineInformation.population: Number of people using this line each day
LineInformation.vehicle: Type of rolling stock used on this line
LineInformation.timeToCross: Average time to travel from one end of the line to the other (in minutes)
